Package is.merkor.core.database.data

Contains classes representing persistent objects mapping to the MerkOr relational database using Hibernate.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PersistentObject Provides basic methods for persistent objects using timestamp as version indicator.
 

Class Summary
AbstractPersistentObject Abstract superclass implementing the PersistentObject interface.
ClusterCBC Maps to the relation CLUSTERS_WW3 in the MerkOr database, results of a CBC-similar clustering algorithm based on co-occurrence analysis of word-windows +/- 3.
ClusterCompoundKey A Compound key consisting of an id of a LexicalItem and an id of a ClusterCBC.
ClusterItem Maps to the relation CLUSTER_ITEMS_WW3 in the MerkOr database.
HierarchClusterCBC HierarchClusterCBC represents a hierarchy of ClusterCBCs, having similar domains.
IceDictSense IceDictSenses maps to the table SENSES in the MerkOr database.
LexicalItem Maps to the relation LEXICAL_ITEM in the MerkOr database.
LexicalRelation The class LexicalRelation maps to the table CONFIDENCE_LEXREL in the MerkOr database.
LexicalRelationType LexicalRelationType maps to the table LEXICAL_RELATION_TYPE in the MerkOr database.
SimilarityCooccRelation A class mapping to the table SIMILARITY_COOCCURRENCE in the MerkOr database.
SimilarityVerbObjRelation A class mapping to the table SIMILARITY_VERB_OBJECT in the MerkOr database.
WordPair A class mapping to the relation WORDPAIR in the MerkOr database.
 

Package is.merkor.core.database.data Description

Contains classes representing persistent objects mapping to the MerkOr relational database using Hibernate.
